title: Paytm | SDE-1 | 2024 | Lowballed - help needed
content:
Education: B.Tech 
Years of Experience: 6 months full time
Current Compensation - 12.6 LPA (8 lakh base + 64k performance bonus + 4 lakh ESOPs)
Prior Experience: 
6 months as Backend Engineer at a fintech startup
8 months as Backend Engineering Intern at multiple startups
Date of the Offer: 19 Nov 2024
Company: Paytm
Title/Level: Software Engineer
Location: Noida/Bangalore
Salary: 10 Lakh
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 1.5 Lakh
Stock bonus: NA
Bonus: NA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 11.5
Benefits: NA
Other details:
I had 1 online test and 2 round of technical interviews and I was able to answer all the questions. Recruiter mentioned that considering only your fixed compensation(8 lakh), the max they can offer is 10 lakh as base. My say is if the current compensation is already low then any hike looks great only in percentages and not absolute numbers. Also, HR directly said since company isn't listed so they won't consider ESOPs as per part of compensation to include it in the hike :( Please guide me how to proceed because I know this is way less than the market standard and what Paytm pays. I don't want to be lowballed again.
